description: Monorepo: create two Railway services. Set Root Directory to 'backend' for API and 'frontend' for web app. Each service has its own railway.json in that folder.

services.name: backend
services.note: Use backend/railway.json; build: npm run build, start: npm run start

services.name: frontend
services.note: Use frontend/railway.json; set REACT_APP_API_URL to backend URL; build: npm run build, start: npm run serve
